title: We’ll realize there’s no political journalism without tech journalism
description: Of the ten richest men in the world on Forbes’ December 2025 list, only two didn’t build their fortunes by running or founding a fully tech-driven company. They are the people who now shape how we think, how we have fun, how we vote, how the economy works, and ultimately whether the world moves forward...
